title: Margherita Classic
description: A timeless favorite with a thin crust, fresh tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves, creating a simple yet delicious flavor combination.

title: Pepperoni Paradise
description: Loaded with savory pepperoni slices, mozzarella cheese, and a zesty tomato sauce, this pizza is a carnivore's dream come true.

title: Veggie Delight
description: Packed with a colorful assortment of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives, topped with a blend of cheeses for a healthy and satisfying option.

title: BBQ Chicken Feast
description: Grilled chicken pieces smothered in tangy barbecue sauce, complemented by red onions, cilantro, and a blend of cheeses, for a mouthwatering BBQ experience.
